Appearance

YrnuAutomate everything with Lua

A Rust program that provides simple and easy lua API for - but not limited to - automating network administrators and cyber spaciliest tasks.

Intro
Installation

Simple

Yrnu provides a simple Lua API for creating scripts to automate various tasks of network engineers, server admins, cybersecurity specialists, and others.

Fast and Secured

Yrnu is a Rust tool, which makes it fast and almost entirely memory-safe

Extandable

Yrnu is a plugin-driven program. It provides a simple Lua API for creating plugins to extend the functionality of the program

Free and Open Source

Yrnu is under the GPLv3 license and the code base can be found on GitHub
